alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Estill, northern Jackson and northeastern Rockcastle Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hummel, or near Mount Vernon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cooksburg, Robinet and Horse Lick around 400 PM EDT. Goochland, Johnetta, Climax, Loam, Disputanta, Rockford and Dango around 405 PM EDT. Threelinks, Eglon and Morrill around 410 PM EDT. Clover Bottom, Sandgap, Collingsworth and Hurley around 415 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kerby Knob, Shirley, Waneta, Alcorn, Brazil, Hisel, Locust Branch, Foxtown, Macedonia, Blanton Flats, Jinks, Wind Cave, Lakes, Blackburn and Old Orchard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
